post.description:
Required permission <b>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENT [CREATE]</b>.\n 
				All request body are required except preview, tags and customAttributes.

Required permission <b>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENT [CREATE]</b>.

All request body are required except <code>preview</code>, <code>tags</code>, <code>contentType</code>, <code>customAttributes</code> and <code>shareCode</code>.

<code>contentType</code> values is used to enforce the Content-Type header needed by the client when uploading the content using the S3 presigned URL. If not specified, it will use fileExtension value.

<code>shareCode</code> format should follows: 

Length: 7
Available characters: abcdefhkpqrstuxyz

<br><p><b>NOTE: Preview is Legacy Code, please use Screenshot for better solution to display preview of a content</b></p>

put.description:
Required permission <b>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENT [UPDATE]</b>.

All request body are required except <code>payload</code>, <code>preview</code>, <code>tags</code>,<code>contentType</code>, <code>updateContentFile</code>, <code>customAttributes</code> and <code>shareCode</code>.

<code>contentType</code> values is used to enforce the Content-Type header needed by the client to upload the content using the S3 presigned URL.

If not specified, it will use <code>fileExtension</code> value.

To update content file, set <code>updateContentFile</code> to <code>true</code> and upload the file using URL in <code>payloadURL.url</code> in response body.

<code>shareCode</code> format should follows:

Max length: 7
Available characters: abcdefhkpqrstuxyz

<br><p><b>NOTE: Preview is Legacy Code, please use Screenshot for better solution to display preview of a content</b></p>

					All request body are required except preview, tags and customAttributes.

						Maximum contentId per request 100

post.description:
Required permission <b>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENT [CREATE]</b>.\n 
				All request body are required except for contentType field. 
				contentType values is used to enforce the Content-Type header needed by the client to upload the content using the presigned URL.
				If not specified, it will use fileExtension value.
				Supported file extensions: pjp, jpg, jpeg, jfif, bmp, png. \n
				Maximum description length: 1024.

Required permission ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENTGROUP [UPDATE]
					replace group name and contents with new ones.

Required permission <b>ADMIN:NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENT [UPDATE]</b>.

All request body are required except <code>payload</code>, <code>preview</code>, <code>tags</code>,<code>contentType</code>, <code>updateContentFile</code>, <code>customAttributes</code> and <code>shareCode</code>.

<code>contentType</code> values is used to enforce the Content-Type header needed by the client to upload the content using the S3 presigned URL.

If not specified, it will use <code>fileExtension</code> value.

To update content file, set <code>updateContentFile</code> to <code>true</code> and upload the file using URL in <code>payloadURL.url</code> in response body.

<code>shareCode</code> format should follows:

Max length: 7
Available characters: abcdefhkpqrstuxyz

<br><p><b>NOTE: Preview is Legacy Code, please use Screenshot for better solution to display preview of a content</b></p>

Required permission <b>NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENT [CREATE]</b>.\n 
			All request body are required except preview, tags and customAttributes.

Required permission <b>NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENT [CREATE]</b>.\n 
				All request body are required except payload, preview, tags, contentType and customAttributes.
				contentType values is used to enforce the Content-Type header needed by the client to upload the content using the S3 presigned URL.
				If not specified, it will use fileExtension value.

put.description:
Required permission <b>NAMESPACE:{namespace}:USER:{userId}:CONTENT [UPDATE]</b>.
				All request body are required except payload, preview, tags, contentType, updateContentFile and customAttributes.
				contentType values is used to enforce the Content-Type header needed by the client to upload the content using the S3 presigned URL.
				If not specified, it will use fileExtension value.
				To update content's file, set <code>updateContentFile</code> to <code>true</code> and upload the file using URL in <code>payloadURL.url</code> in response body. 
				<br><p><b>NOTE: Preview is Legacy Code, please use Screenshot for better solution to display preview of a content</b></p>
